root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 15-4-2, translated into en
root.data: This indicator uses two established classifications: (1) the land categories classification for greenhouse gas (GHG) inventory reporting defined by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) (Penman et al. 2003), and (2) the global mountain classification established by the UN Environment World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC) (Kapos et al. 2000).
